alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brandon, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Palm River-Clair Mel, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Riverview, West Park, South Tampa, University Of Tampa, Mango, Peter O Knight Airport, Tampa Executive Airport, Boyette, Orient Park, Raymond James Stadium, Valrico, Ybor City, and Soho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
